channel.title: Histidine Kinase on RD's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Histidine Kinase on RD's Blog

item.title: Histidine Protein Kinases: Key Signal Transducers Outside the Animal Kingdom
item.description: Comprehensive overview of Histidine Protein Kinases (HPKs), their role in two-component signaling systems across bacteria and non-animal eukaryotes, their domain structure, mechanism, and evolutionary significance.
